thread.title: Strike day 3: tourists trapped by cancelled services | West Country (W)
thread.title_full: Strike day 3: tourists trapped by cancelled services | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Strike day 3: tourists trapped by cancelled services | West Country (W)
text:
As a three-day strike by RMT Union members nears its end, business leaders have raised concerns about the timing of the action.
A reduced service has been running on routes to and from the South West, with trains to Cornwall down to once every two hours, and no trains at all on many branch lines.
It caused frustrations among travellers today, others said they'd barely noticed it. But sterner words were raised by business leaders, who said the strike had deterred tourists after a summer where bad weather had already cost local businesses.
Play video Although local people knew about the strike and could plan ahead, some visitors were caught out:
